passive.name: Stave Off the Lingering Cold
passive.description: After entering battle, increases the wearer's SPD by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> and DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer takes DMG, this effect will disappear. This effect will resume after the end of the wearer's next turn.
